<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;A&quot; is an alias for a different flag. For most clients it&#39;s more convenient</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if this function returns unaliased Args, so create an unaliased arg for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// returning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This creates a completely new Arg object for the unaliased Arg because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the alias and the unaliased arg can have different Kinds and different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Values (due to AliasArgs&lt;&gt;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the spelling from the unaliased option.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> UnaliasedSpelling = Args.MakeArgString(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(UnaliasedOption.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option/#a6604b3e1abb2089b8fb2e1880a92daa6">getPrefix</a>()) + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(UnaliasedOption.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option/#acc97061b780820c39cc4afd878aec21b">getName</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It&#39;s a bit weird that aliased and unaliased arg share one index, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the index is mostly use as a memory optimization in render().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Due to this, ArgList::getArgString(A-&gt;getIndex()) will return the spelling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the aliased arg always, while A-&gt;getSpelling() returns either the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unaliased or the aliased arg, depending on which Arg object it&#39;s called on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UnaliasedA =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::make&#95;unique&lt;Arg&gt;(UnaliasedOption, UnaliasedSpelling, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-&gt;getIndex());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arg">Arg</a> &#42;RawA = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.get();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  UnaliasedA-&gt;setAlias(std::move(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option/#ade9f02df6ca48ba1f7a3010c445393be">getKind</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option/#a60071c133b78fca37ea728e2d1db6fdba27b06b20590e7663bda7eaecf0c37a9c">FlagClass</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Values are usually owned by the ArgList. The exception are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CommaJoined flags, where the Arg owns the values. For aliased flags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// make the unaliased Arg the owner of the values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: There aren&#39;t many uses of CommaJoined -- try removing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CommaJoined in favor of just calling StringRef::split(&#39;,&#39;) instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UnaliasedA-&gt;getValues() = RawA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arg/#a5fae2e9403c3f2b91455abe787c41add">getValues</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UnaliasedA-&gt;setOwnsValues(RawA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arg/#a29d52b9fb127c8147a41bda94dbe004c">getOwnsValues</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RawA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arg/#a7ff387bacccd19c72cfd221be08db836">setOwnsValues</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UnaliasedA;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FlagClass aliases can have AliasArgs&lt;&gt;; add those to the unaliased arg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Val = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option/#a1ae70494db86ba499b0d16e5f5d0a0af">getAliasArgs</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;Val != </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\0&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UnaliasedA-&gt;getValues().push&#95;back(Val);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move past the &#39;\\0&#39; to the next argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Val += strlen(Val) + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UnaliasedOption.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option/#ade9f02df6ca48ba1f7a3010c445393be">getKind</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option/#a60071c133b78fca37ea728e2d1db6fdba00b88f85db9274d8b0b201f43ee119aa">JoinedClass</a> &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option/#a1ae70494db86ba499b0d16e5f5d0a0af">getAliasArgs</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A Flag alias for a Joined option must provide an argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UnaliasedA-&gt;getValues().push&#95;back(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UnaliasedA;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
